title: Paul McCartney Live 2005-Space Within Us-rECOn-1080p H264 DTS5.1
description:
Paul McCartney Live 2005-Space Within Us-rECOn-1080p H264 DTS5.1 AVCHD

This release is intended to commemorate the recent tour.  Sourced from the blu-ray disk, we have edited out all of the talking and interviews, so that only the music remains.  Also included are the three "audio check" songs that are included as extras on the disk.  While I know some of you may prefer the entire video, I find that the interviews and talking parts distracts from what otherwise is a fantastic live performance.  Those who prefer the complete version and are tempted to complain, please use a dime and call someone who gives a damn and find another more suitable release.

Beatles fans are sure to get a whole lotta enjoyment from a Paul McCartney concert, recorded during the US tour in 2005. During the show, Paul and the audience talk with and listen to the astronauts abord the MIR space station.  The show includes a combination of Beatles, Wings, and Paul McCartney songs of various styles and tempo, performed in front of lively and loud groups of all ages.  It seems everyone know the words. Drive My Car and Helter Skelter are practically guaranteed to give you goosebumps.  Paul is especially personable and engaging as the band leader and front man.

Some might wish the video was not so focused on the audience and that the audio did not include so much crowd noise.  At times I agree the camera changes too fast and is distracting to some degree but not objectionable.  This along with the crowd noise makes the experience seem very much like actually being in the audience.  After all, it's not in a studio so this is how things really looked and sounded.  

The original blu-ray disk was disassembled and rECOnstructed as follows.  The original 1080i VC-1 video was re-encoded and deinterlaced using X264 video.   The original PCM5.1 audio was encoded to DTS5.1.  I have also included a downmixed DD2.0 audio track for those with less sophisticated audio gear.  

The disk is authored as an AVCHD suitable for either BD or DVD / AVCHD media.  Chapters points are included.  The content easily fits on a standard DVDR double sided disk.  Just be sure to burn using UDF2.5 file system.

So others can be sure of the quality of this torrent, please come back and comment below after you have finished and played the contents.  This way others will get another opinion of this release.  

Product Details

Artist: Paul McCartney
Video: H264, uncropped, progressive, 1920 x 1080, 29.976fps
Audio: English (DTS 5.1 lossy; Dolby Digital 2.0 lossy)
Compression: DTS 1536kbps 5.1 channel; Dolby Digital 448kbps 2.0 channel) 
Subtitles: NA
Region: NA
Aspect Ratio: 16:9
Run Time: 1 hour 28 minutes 12 seconds
